card.name: Thallid Devourer
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid Devourer. Remove three spore counters from Thallid Devourer: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. Sacrifice a Saproling: Thallid Devourer gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Thelonite Druid
card.text: {1}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Forests you control become 2/3 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

card.name: Thelonite Monk
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a green creature: Target land becomes a Forest.

card.name: Thelon's Chant
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Thelon's Chant unless you pay {G}. Whenever a player puts a Swamp onto the battlefield, Thelon's Chant deals 3 damage to that player unless he or she puts a -1/-1 counter on a creature he or she controls.

card.name: Thelon's Curse
card.text: Blue creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may choose any number of tapped blue creatures he or she controls and pay {U} for each creature chosen this way. If the player does, untap those creatures.

card.name: Thorn Thallid
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thorn Thallid. Remove three spore counters from Thorn Thallid: Thorn Thallid deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Thrull Champion
card.text: Thrull creatures get +1/+1. {T}: Gain control of target Thrull for as long as you control Thrull Champion.

card.name: Thrull Retainer
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Sacrifice Thrull Retainer: Regenerate enchanted creature.

card.name: Thrull Wizard
card.text: {1}{B}: Counter target black spell unless that spell's controller pays {B} or {3}.

card.name: Tidal Flats
card.text: {U}{U}: For each attacking creature without flying, its controller may pay {1}. If he or she doesn't, creatures you control blocking that creature gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Tidal Flats
card.text: {U}{U}: For each attacking creature without flying, its controller may pay {1}. If he or she doesn't, creatures you control blocking that creature gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Tidal Flats
card.text: {U}{U}: For each attacking creature without flying, its controller may pay {1}. If he or she doesn't, creatures you control blocking that creature gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Tidal Influence
card.text: Cast Tidal Influence only if no permanents named Tidal Influence are on the battlefield. Tidal Influence enters the battlefield with a tide counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a tide counter on Tidal Influence. As long as there is exactly one tide counter on Tidal Influence, all blue creatures get -2/-0. As long as there are exactly three tide counters on Tidal Influence, all blue creatures get +2/+0. Whenever there are four tide counters on Tidal Influence, remove all tide counters from it.

card.name: Tourach's Chant
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Tourach's Chant unless you pay {B}. Whenever a player puts a Forest onto the battlefield, Tourach's Chant deals 3 damage to that player unless he or she puts a -1/-1 counter on a creature he or she controls.

card.name: Tourach's Gate
card.text: Enchant land you control Sacrifice a Thrull: Put three time counters on Tourach's Gate. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from Tourach's Gate. If there are no time counters on Tourach's Gate, sacrifice it. Tap enchanted land: Attacking creatures you control get +2/-1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if enchanted land is untapped.

card.name: Vodalian Knights
card.text: First strike Vodalian Knights can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Vodalian Knights. {U}: Vodalian Knights gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Vodalian Mage
card.text: {U}, {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Vodalian Mage
card.text: {U}, {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Vodalian Mage
card.text: {U}, {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Vodalian War Machine
card.text: Defender Tap an untapped Merfolk you control: Vodalian War Machine can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Tap an untapped Merfolk you control: Vodalian War Machine gets +2/+1 until end of turn. When Vodalian War Machine dies, destroy all Merfolk tapped this turn to pay for its abilities.

card.name: Zelyon Sword
card.text: You may choose not to untap Zelyon Sword during your untap step. {3}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 for as long as Zelyon Sword remains tapped.
